rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with natural lighting and built-in storage.
An open-plan living, dining, and kitchen area with eco-friendly materials, energy-efficient lighting, and ample natural ventilation. The space is designed to promote social interaction.
A dedicated home theater area integrated into the living-dining area, featuring energy-efficient LED screens and acoustic panels that enhance sound quality while maintaining privacy.
A transitional space leading to a large garden, featuring a small seating area and natural stone pathways.

openings.description: Main entrance door with secure locking mechanism and natural ventilation design.
Backdoor leading to the garden area, enhancing connectivity with nature.
Energy-efficient windows placed strategically to maximize natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles.

garden_area.description: A large garden area featuring native vegetation, water features for natural cooling, and sustainable landscaping practices.
